name: Bash Crab
description:
Apple Panic is a game where you must stop an invasion of crab monsters. Dig pits to trap your enemy then knock them to the floor below. The farther they fall, the the more points you'll earn. But watch out for special crabs. Green pea crab are slow but will chase you farther once they spot you. Yellow spider crabs are fast and require some planning to trap them safely. Grey stone crabs need to be dropped twice in order to break through their tough armor-like shell.

Controls

Arrow keys = Move
Ctrl = Dig / Fill Pit
Esc = Pause
Alt+F = Toggle fullscreen

Credits Music

"Getting Started," "At the End of the Day," "Raining City," "Top City," and "Shuffle" from the album Friendship Adventure by Ozzed.

Background Tiles

Simplified Platformer Pack by Kenney.

Movement Scripts

From Perfect Platformer in 15min! tutorial by Heartbeast.
